thread.section_title: School Stream - School Communication App Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of School Stream - School Communication App | schoolstream.com.au
thread.title: Zartaj Waseem, Asstt. Dir. Administration
thread.title_full: School Stream - School Communication App reviewed by Zartaj Waseem, Asstt. Dir. Administration

author: Zartaj Waseem, Asstt. Dir. Administration
title: Zartaj Waseem, Asstt. Dir. Administration
text:
We have been using School Stream App for almost all kinds of communication with our parent body. It is a very convenient and flexible tool. The formidable forms feature gives you the opportunity to design forms easily.
There's just one concern that it gets slow, due to the amount of data probably, add at times over taxing for the phone.
